statements: SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE date_issued BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_invoices FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_invoices > 3;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY date_issued DESC;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount, payment_status FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY date_due;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE date_due < '2023-01-31' AND payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, invoice_amount FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, invoice_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT i.invoice_id, i.invoice_date, i.invoice_amount, p.payment_date, p.payment_amount FROM invoices AS i INNER JOIN payments AS p ON i.invoice_id = p.invoice_id;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date, invoice_amount FROM invoices WHERE invoice_amount > 100 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date, invoice_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY invoice_amount ASC

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, i.invoice_date, i.invoice_amount, p.payment_id, p.payment_date, p.payment_amount FROM invoices i INNER JOIN payments p ON i.invoice_id = p.invoice_id WHERE i.invoice_amount > p.payment_amount
SELECT customer_id, SUM(invoice_amount) AS total_amount FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(invoice_id) AS num_invoices FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_invoices DESC
SELECT * FROM Invoices;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT invoice_number, amount FROM Invoices WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT invoice_number, amount FROM Invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_number, amount, due_date FROM Invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT invoice_number, amount, customer_name FROM Invoices JOIN Customers ON Invoices.invoice_id = Customers.customer_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_number, amount FROM Invoices WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'f0c8e1db-1711-4cd0-948f-d5ebf768bb5a';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments JOIN invoices ON payments.invoice_id = invoices.invoice_id WHERE payments.amount < invoices.amount ORDER BY payments.payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Invoices;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT invoice_date, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount_paid DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Items.product_id, Products.product_name, SUM(Items.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM InvoiceItems AS Items JOIN Products ON Items.product_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY Items.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
